metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption indemangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

criterions.comment: gcc-3.3 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
